tblformaudititems.screate-table:
CREATE TABLE `tblformaudititems` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `AuditMonth` varchar(45) NOT NULL,
  `AuditSessionId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `BranchCode` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `PartNumber` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `PartRef` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `PartDescription` text NOT NULL,
  `PartType` text NOT NULL,
  `Price` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `Supplier` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `SystemCount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `UnaccountedQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `AccountedQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `MissingQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `DamagedQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `SoldQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `OthersQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `Remarks` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `LastScannedBy` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `LastScannedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `VerifiedBy` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `VerifiedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `CreatedDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `UpdatedDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  `deletedflag` tinyint(2) DEFAULT 0,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_audit_session` (`AuditMonth`),
  KEY `idx_material` (`PartNumber`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6731 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

tblformuuditscannedparts.screate-table:
CREATE TABLE `tblformuuditscannedparts` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `AuditSessionId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `BranchCode` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `PartNumber` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `PartRef` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `PartDescription` text NOT NULL,
  `PartType` text NOT NULL,
  `Price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00,
  `Supplier` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `SystemCount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `AccountedQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `MissingQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `DamagedQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `SoldQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `OthersQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `Remarks` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `IsTransmitted` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0,
  `LastScannedBy` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `LastScannedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `VerifiedBy` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `VerifiedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `CreatedDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `UpdatedDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  `deletedflag` tinyint(2) DEFAULT 0,
  `ItemId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_audit_session` (`AuditSessionId`),
  KEY `idx_material` (`PartNumber`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

tbluser.screate-table:
CREATE TABLE `tbluser` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `password` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `salt` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `deletedflag` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0,
  `CreatedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `CreatedBy` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `UpdatedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `UpdatedBy` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

tblformauditbranchlist.screate-table:
CREATE TABLE `tblformauditbranchlist` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `BranchCode` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `BranchName` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `deletedflag` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0,
  `CreatedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `CreatedBy` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `UpdatedDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `UpdatedBy` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=952 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

tblformauditlogs.screate-table:
CREATE TABLE `tblformauditlogs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `Branch` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `Action` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `CreatedDate` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `CreatedBy` varchar(45) NOT NULL,
  `UpdatedBy` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,
  `UpdatedDate` datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`CreatedBy`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
